description.original: Add banner images to your notes!
description.translation: Add banner images to your notes!

dict..setDesc(\"Set how big the banner should: .setDesc("Set how big the banner should be in pixels")
dict..setDesc(\"Set a style for all of your b: .setDesc("Set a style for all of your banners")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the banner size inside th: .setDesc("Set the banner size inside the internal embed")
.setDesc("Set the banner size inside the page preview embed")
dict..setDesc(\"Enabling this will display a: .setDesc("Enabling this will display a preview of the images suggested")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"Pick an emoji to use a: .setPlaceholder("Pick an emoji to use as an icon")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"Pick an image to use a: .setPlaceholder("Pick an image to use as a banner")
dict..appendText(\"Choose whether to display: .appendText("Choose whether to display the banner in the internal embed. This is the embed that appears when you write ")
.appendText("Choose whether to display the banner in the page preview embed. This is the embed that appears from the ")
dict..appendText(\"Set a customizable frontma: .appendText("Set a customizable frontmatter field to use for banner data.")
dict..appendText(\"Set a modifier key that mu: .appendText("Set a modifier key that must be used to drag a banner.")
dict..appendText(\" means that you must hold: .appendText(" means that you must hold down Shift as you drag the banner to move it. This can help to avoid accidental banner shifts.")
dict..appendText(\", you can set an offset, r: .appendText(", you can set an offset, relative to the left side of the note. This can be any valid ")
dict..appendText(\"Align the icon vertically,: .appendText("Align the icon vertically, relative to a banner (if any).")
dict..appendText(\", you can set an offset, r: .appendText(", you can set an offset, relative to the center of a banner's lower edge. This follows the same format as the setting above.")
dict..appendText(\"This is only applied in th: .appendText("This is only applied in the Icon modal and the banner icon in the preview view")
dict..appendText(\"Show up to this many sugge: .appendText("Show up to this many suggestions when searching through local images.")
dict..appendText(\"is on can lead to some slo: .appendText("is on can lead to some slowdowns")
dict..appendText(\"Select a folder to exclusi: .appendText("Select a folder to exclusively search for banner files in.")
dict..appendText(\"If empty, it will search t: .appendText("If empty, it will search the entire vault for image files")
dict..appendText(\"Allow dragging the banner: .appendText("Allow dragging the banner on mobile devices.")
dict..appendText(\"ERROR! Make sure that you: .appendText("ERROR! Make sure that you set the ")
dict..appendText(\" to a valid folder in the: .appendText(" to a valid folder in the settings.")
